mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND user_pwd = #{userPwd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (user_id, user_pwd, user_name, user_address, detail_address ,user_phone, user_email, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{userAddress}, #{detailAddress},#{userPhone}, #{userEmail}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt});
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET user_pwd = #{userPwd}, user_name = #{userName}, user_address = #{userAddress}, detail_address = #{detailAddress}, user_phone = #{userPhone}, user_email = #{userEmail}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE user_id = #{userId}
